page.title: 09THE SWARBRICK FAMILY
page.content: My bedside alarm buzzes merrily at 5:3Oam today,my husband,Paul,has to be at work early.I make him a cup of tea on the Aga and then pack him his lunch and flask which he takes with him when he leaves at 6:OOam. My three children,Tracy,Victoria and Paul awake at 7:3Oam,they all have a breakfast of cereal then they get themselves ready for school.Victoria and Tracy take it in turns to feed the animals,seven guinea pigs and a rabbit before they go to school. I have always taken my children to school by car,I drop Paul off at Bramford School first,and then the two girls at Claydon High School.
